name: Slorpus Slaughter VII: Singular Shoot Soul
name_original: Slorpus Slaughter VII: Singular Shoot Soul
description:
Slorpus Slaughter VII: Singular Shoot Soul is a short bullet-hell style single player shooter puzzle game. Blast your way through eight deceptively simple levels, as you attempt to clear all on-screen enemies. The catch? You only have one shot.

SSVII also features full custom level support, using our level editor here!
